title: Domestic terrorism responses in UK and Nigeria

content.question:
The governments of both Great Britain and Nigeria have responded to domestic terrorism in the last twenty years.
(a) Identify one group that has engaged in terrorism in Great Britain and describe its major demand. 
(b) Describe one policy response the government of Great Britain adopted to address domestic terrorism. 
(c) Identify one group that has engaged in terrorism in Nigeria and describe its major demand. 
(d) Describe one policy response the government of Nigeria adopted to address domestic terrorism.

frqParts.text:

(c) Identify one group that has engaged in terrorism in Nigeria and describe its major demand. 
(d) Describe one policy response the government of Nigeria adopted to address domestic terrorism.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

topic.text: 4.5: Impact of Social Movements and Interest Groups

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
